review: We ordered this to replace out roku which had started presenting with red lines. I also replaced Netflix with Amazon Prime. Netflix movies are so outdated and they do not replace often enough. I am so pleased with the ease of using the firestick and the quality of the pictures. Best of all I am loving the offerings from Amazon Prime. So much better than Netflix. I am now watching The White Queen season one for free. If you are thinking of switching don't hesitate.
